data.title: Robert Randolph Band at Rainbow Summer: HIGHLIGHT
data.meta_description: The Robert Randolph Band, led by its pedal steel guitarist namesake, will give a joyous, gospel-infused genre-bending performance
data.text:
Free Event

Co-Presented with Culture x Design as part of the Summer of Soul: Outdoor Marketplace & Concert Series

Known for their electrifying live shows, The Robert Randolph Band, led by its pedal steel guitarist namesake, will give a joyous, gospel-infused genre-bending performance courtesy of their multiple Grammy-nominated studio albums.

A mainstay of the festival touring circuit since 2004, having opened for renowned acts such as Eric Clapton and the Dave Matthews Band before headlining their own international tours, The Robert Randolph Band (formerly Robert Randolph and the Family Band) brings its pulsating rock-gospel fusion to Milwaukee.

This show is part of a unique partnership between MPAC and Culture x Design and is the second show in the inaugural Summer of Soul: Outdoor Marketplace & Concert Series.

Additional vibes provided by DJ Romke.

Stay tuned to MPAC Socials for any weather updates that may impact the event.

Schedule of July 24 “Rainbow Summer of Soul”:

5:00 PM – Summer of Soul’s Marketplace featuring a vibrant array of vendors, including local artists, restauranteurs, crafters, and makers

5:30 – 7:30 PM – Bubbles Playtime with Michelle Hackett on South Grounds

5:30 – 6:30 PM Happy Hour Yoga with Yoga Six; Space is limited – Register Now!

7:00 PM – Robert Randolf Band Performance in Peck Pavilion

All Day FUN

Elysian Arcs by Atelier Sisu

Giant Lawn Games

Rainbow Piano – BE the art!

Food & Beverages

Sazama’s River Edge Patio serving Saz’s Festival Favorites and Beverages

Food trucks starting at 5:00 PM: Cocina Filipina | Pineapple Cafe | El Sazon | Marco Pollo | Isa’s Ice Cream | Little Havana Express | Gordo’s

Explore Rainbow Summer Events

Learn more about Summer of Soul
